page.title: 14A SELF EMPLOYED GARDENER
page.content: While doing our survey we met a man hedge-cutting at Gt.Plumstead . Mr. W. Maidstone told told us he is a self- employed{gardener.}He also works as a part time{grounds man}and he does odd jobs. On fine days he works 12 hours a day. If the weather is not fine he works less.In his job he uses his own {tools}and some contract tools. He works for the Parish council one day a week at Great Plumstead. He uses these tools,forks,spades,shears,4 mowers, hedge trimmer, grass and brush cutter and a birch broom. He is also a part time{chimney sweep.}He has been doing work like this for over forty years and he would not like a mundane job. In this work he is always finding something new. He also runs the local {scout group}3-4 evenings a week.
